body: Not into loicon but the story made me happy. It just adorable 8/10

Bruh, I couldn't fap, it's too sweet. I kinda want a better conclusion, maybe an After Years chapter, with her being a (legal) teenager, and ready to start a new life with him. But I guess this is fine too... Also >5 years ago. Dang

@kamitokaryusai i kinda relate that. But well.. its fact that "most" of girls these day are just interested with the "So-called-Bad-boy" who probably still asking for money to their parents (true story)..... But hey there must be a girl that fit you the most even you just barely know her. And that time you will know that you must treasure her no matter what.
when it give you a pure smile... that was the finest ending
@SalaD_a$$_likr you probably didn't know that this is the 3rd chapter
There's no much info about them, so they could be be stepbrother and stepsister, and there would be no problem... at least for me :)

Fucking ninjas cutting onions again sob* ooouuuuu!!! I envy this kind of love story so much and to put it in realism this love actually is true like my mother and father relationship haah thats why all girls in my class doesnt pass my standard of what love is they think love is just a food where the first time you taste it you feel good but when repeated so many times they grew tired of the taste i think what this love truly is is like vegetable salad that a kid is eating first you dont like it then you got used to it and become inlove that you cant stop eating it forever and woah im philosopher anon kun now haha anyway i want more of this the point of view of her
I think these stories are cute but they just don't work in the long run.
"not cool"!? R U SRS!? What are the girls in her class smoking? This guy has got like one of those otome game/should manga faces...
Ootsuka Reika has some of the best lolicon stuff.
